Posts.Content: I'm a breast survivor but I'm not a two time survivor in my circle of friends I know three ladies that are two time survivors. Their approach was the same as it was the first time they were diagnosed. With the guidance of your doctors along with prayer you will be a two time survivor for many years.
Posts.Title: Terrified...........please help!!!

Posts.Content: Sounds like you love your aunt dearly my suggestion is to treat her like you always have with love and admiration.
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer

Posts.Content: I am a breast cancer survivor of 9 years. I would be willing to participate
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Survivor
